titles.title: Recognizing the cultural and educational contributions of American Ballet Theatre throughout its 65 years of service as "America's National Ballet Company".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Mr. Kuhl (NY) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 751.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/16/2006--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes American Ballet Theatre's: (1) 65 years of service as America's National Ballet Company; (2) service as a U.S. cultural ambassador; and (3) education, outreach, and artistic development programs.
